sentences.en: Cheese is really a good lure for mice.
sentences.cn: 奶酪是很好的引诱老鼠的诱饵.

sentences.en: Computer games are luring youngsters away from their lessons.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏诱惑着青少年，分散了他们的学习注意力。

sentences.en: Don't lure her away from her duty.
Don't lure him from his duty.
Don't you dare try to lure my new secretary away from the company — we value her work highly.
sentences.cn: 你敢引诱我的新秘书离开公司!我们对她的工作评价很高.

sentences.en: Gant succumbed to the lure of new land.
sentences.cn: 甘德也抵抗不住新地方的吸引力.

sentences.en: He lured her to his home and shot her with his father's gun.
sentences.cn: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

sentences.en: Her winning ways were always enough to lure any man on.
sentences.cn: 她那迷人的举止足以使所有的男人为之神魂颠倒.

sentences.en: His wrist was beginning to tire from working the heavy lure.
sentences.cn: 由于不断地转动那沉重的钓饵,他的手腕已经感到酸痛了.

sentences.en: How can you lure the owner into leaving the house unlocked so that we can steal the jewels?
sentences.cn: 你怎么才能骗主人离开却不锁门,以便我们进去偷珠宝 呢 ?

sentences.en: Life in big cities is a lure for many country boys.
sentences.cn: 大城市的生活吸引着许多乡下小伙子.

sentences.en: Service stations use petrol as a bait to lure motorists into the restaurants and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 加油站以汽油为诱饵，吸引开车的人用餐以及使用其他设施。

sentences.en: She couldn't withstand the lure of money and was dragged into the mire.
sentences.cn: 她经不起金钱的引诱,被拉下水了.

sentences.en: Since John is a womanizer, it is not difficult to bring him to the lure.
sentences.cn: 约翰既然是个好色之徒, 引他上钩并不难.

sentences.en: So this had been a trick to lure the tiger from the mountain! Zhu Laogong's lungs nearly burst with rage.
sentences.cn: 朱老巩明白过来,是调虎离山计, 一时气炸了肺.

sentences.en: The company aims to lure smokers back to cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 该公司旨在把吸烟人士诱回到香烟上来。

sentences.en: The excitement of hunting big game in Africa has been a lure to Europeans for 200 years.
sentences.cn: 在非洲捕捉大型猎物所带来的刺激，200年来一直吸引着欧洲人。

sentences.en: Why should this lure of youth continue to possess him?
sentences.cn: 为什么这种青春的魅力竟继续迷着他 呀 ?

trans.tran_cn: 吸引力，魅力，诱惑物，诱饵
trans.tran_en: something that attracts people, or the quality of being able to do this
to persuade someone to do something, especially something wrong or dangerous, by making it seem attractive or exciting

trans.tran_en: to persuade someone to do something, especially something wrong or dangerous, by making it seem attractive or exciting
